entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
